page.title: 07ABBEY NATIONAL
page.content: The branch in Hainault stays open from 9:00am till 5:00pm and the staff have a 1 hour lunch break. From the 1st to the 6th of July 1,762 customers came into their branch. Three full_time staff work here and one part_time. The total amount of cash and cheques on the 8th of July was N.E.T Â£16,182,86. It usualy takes 7 days to grant a mortgage and their branch usually gives 3_4 a week. A mortgage is an amount of money paid out to a person to buy a house with. Altogether there are about 600 branches and also small local agents. The General manager of Abbey National is Peter Birch. The biggest cheque they have ever received is Â£30,000. The computer they use is an M30 Olivetti. It stores automatically.
